alert.note: Alert for Coastal Volusia; Indian River; Martin; Northern Brevard County; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 29 at 3:47AM EST until January 29 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON... ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 9 AM SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 28 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northwest winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Southern Brevard, Indian River, St. Lucie, Martin, Coastal Volusia and Northern Brevard Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 1 AM to 9 AM Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, until 5 PM this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Volusia; Indian River; Martin; Northern Brevard County; Southern Brevard County; St. Lucie
